item.title: Snigdha Panigrahi
item.description: I am a statistician with wide-ranging interests, directed towards understanding big, diverse and complex data. Before joining the University of Michigan in 2018, I completed my doctoral thesis at Stanford University with Jonathan Taylor in the same year.
